verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite, <WH7747> and said, <WH559>
Dominion <WH4910> and fear <WH6343> are with <WH5973> him, he maketh <WH6213> peace <WH7965> in his high places. <WH4791>
Is there <WH3426> any number <WH4557> of his armies? <WH1416> and upon <WH5921> whom <WH4310> doth not <WH3808> his light <WH216> arise? <WH6965>
How <WH4100> then can man <WH582> be justified <WH6663> with <WH5973> God? <WH410> or how <WH4100> can he be clean <WH2135> that is born <WH3205> of a woman? <WH802>
Behold <WH2005> even <WH5704> to the moon, <WH3394> and it shineth <WH166> not; <WH3808> yea, the stars <WH3556> are not pure <WH2141> <WH3808> in his sight. <WH5869>
How much less <WH637> <WH3588> man, <WH582> that is a worm? <WH7415> and the son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> which is a worm? <WH8438>
